patch 8.0.1638: popup test fails depending on environment variable

Problem:    Popup test fails depending on environment variable.
Solution:   Reset $COLORFGBG when running Vim in a terminal. (closes #2693)

patch 8.0.1638: popup test fails depending on environment variable

Problem:    Popup test fails depending on environment variable.
Solution:   Reset $COLORFGBG when running Vim in a terminal. (closes #2693)
